you know, it used to be a pressed went for the truth. i mean they always when tapped like pit bulls, they went after the truth and and that's not the case anymore.

i've had literally hundreds of people who reported to me and the first thing i had four rules rule 1. did you do it? rule two, can somebody blame you? and we'll 3? we're here to help move forward. show me the money but basically never lie to me because whatever it is on this date and time is true. yes, it will change in the future without of that, because everything changes, but the spin doctors can make you believe that something very
